vulnerable_code: public abstract class BareBone_X509TrustManagerCanNotBypassExt implements X509TrustManager { ... }
description: The implementation of X509TrustManager does not perform any validation on the server or client certificates, which can lead to insecure communication channels.
recommendation: Implement proper validation in the checkClientTrusted and checkServerTrusted methods to ensure that the certificates are validated properly before establishing the connection.
